descriptionHtml:
Mata Nui's Sword from Bionicle: The Legend Reborn.

The sword is at Riverwood, in a wooden cart. Shouldn't be hard to find. This being my first mod, I wasn't bothered to hide it somewhere where someone has to have completed the game to get a powerful sword. Because this is relatively powerful, if you are starting a new game, that is.

Please notify any errors, and offer any help to fix them, cause as you can tell, I am new to skyrim modding. Please don't be hard on me if it doesn't work, or I did something wrong, I'm very, very, new to Nexus Mods.
author: BionicleSkyrimFan117
